channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Share, Social Login and Social Comments Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Share, Social Login and Social Comments Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-2836|2024-06-18T15:28:31.078Z -- unknown -- social%20share%2C%20social%20login%20and%20social%20comments%20plugin
item.description: The Social Share, Social Login and Social Comments Plugin WordPress plugin before 7.13.64 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as editors to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed

item.title: CVE-2024-2836|2024-04-15T05:00:05.687Z -- unknown -- social%20share%2C%20social%20login%20and%20social%20comments%20plugin
item.description: The Social Share, Social Login and Social Comments Plugin WordPress plugin before 7.13.64 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as editors to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
